problems.title: Print Elements Greater Than X
problems.description:
Print all elements in the array that are greater than a given number x. Print elements in the same order as they appear in the array, each on a new line. If no elements are greater than x, print nothing.

Input Format:
First line contains n, the size of array.
Second line contains n space-separated integers.
Third line contains x, the threshold value.

Output Format:
Print elements greater than x, each on a new line.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
10 20 30 40 50
25

Sample Output
30
40
50

Explanation:
Elements greater than 25 are 30, 40, and 50.
hintsList: Use if (arr[i] > x) inside the loop to check each element.
